    "period": "Ancient Greek mythology",
    "period_reasoning": "The play features characters from Greek mythology: Alcide (French name for Heracles/Hercules), Déjanire (Deianira, wife of Heracles), Iole (princess loved by Heracles), Nessus (a centaur in Greek mythology), and Junon (Hera in Greek mythology).
